O

onActionAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method takes the user to the Add Appointment screen.
onActionAddCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method takes the user to the Add Customer screen.
onActionCancelAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method returns the user to the Main Menu without saving any information.
onActionCancelCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
* This method returns the user to the Main Menu without saving any information.
onActionCancelUpdate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
This method returns the user to the Main Menu without saving any information.
onActionCancelUpdate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
This method returns the user to the Main Menu without saving any information.
onActionClearAppSort(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method any Appointment that appeared prior to filtering via Month or Week radio button.
onActionCustomerDelete(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method removes a Customer from the Customers table and database.
onActionDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method removes an Appointment from the Appointments table and database.
onActionDisplayReport1(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method displays the first report (see README) for the user to read.
onActionDisplayReport2(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method displays the second report (see README) for the user to read.
onActionDisplayReport3(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method displays the third report (see README) for the user to read.
onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LogInController
This method closes the program when the exit button is selected.
onActionLogIn(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LogInController
This method checks the login information to determine what type of user is trying to login and accepts if information is correct.
onActionSaveAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method returns the user to the Main Menu and adds new Appointment to table/observable list and database.
onActionSaveCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
* This method returns the user to the Main Menu and adds new Customer to table/observable list and database.
onActionSaveUpdate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
This method returns the user to the Main Menu and updates an existing Appointment in the table/observable list and database.
onActionSaveUpdate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
This method returns the user to the Main Menu and updates an existing Customer in the table/observable list and database.
onActionSortByCountry(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method sorts the Customer and associated Appointment tables to only show information that corresponds to selected Country.
onActionSortByFLD(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method sorts the Customer and Appointment tables to only show information that corresponds to selected Division.
onActionSortByMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method filters Appointments to display only those that occur within the next month.
onActionSortByWeek(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method filters Appointments to display only those that occur within the next week.
onActionSortDivisions(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method sorts the Divsions by displaying only Divisions connected to selected Country or displays all Divisions.
onActionSortDivisions(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
This method sorts the Divsions by displaying only Divisions connected to selected Country and the Division already associated with this Customer.
onActionUpdateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method takes the user to the Update Appointment screen.
onActionUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method takes the user to the Update Customer screen.
